name: Danganronpa: Bitter Truth Chap1: Body Discovery
name_original: Danganronpa: Bitter Truth Chap1: Body Discovery
description:
So, I just got back into Ren'Py.

I decided to use my skills in art and the fact I have a completed oc killing game to my advantage.

Here I present to you, Danganronpa: Bitter Truth's chapter 1 Body Discovery!

The characters featured in this mini-visual novel are:

Uegi Sawu, Ultimate Tutor.

Watashi Yu, Ultimate Boy Idol.

And of course, the character who died!

I hope you enjoy this!

It took over a combined 6 hours to make!

This project most likely will not have more parts to it, seeing as this was just a test project.

I wanted to see what I could do with a game, nothing more.

Now,  if I really sat down, I could full well make an investigation and class trial for this chapter. Hell, I could make a whole game for this. Though, that'd be quite time consuming and quite tiring. So, there's little to no chance it'll happen.

Also, no. this does not have music or voice acting. I could possibly add that in, but it's very unlikely.
